Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its market worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to you at a special price of $10,000. This is a fantastic deal considering the product's true worth is closer to $12,000. I hope this aligns well with your budget and vision. Should you have any questions or require more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
